How to use

Click in the open space to add a node.
Ctrl(⌘)-drag from one node to another to add or select an edge1.
Drag a node to move the graph layout.
Click a node or an edge to select it.
Press the ctrl key and select two nodes to add or select an edge.
Use the delete key to delete a selected node or link.

For touch screen users:
1Press the 'Ctrl key' button and select two nodes to add or select an edge.

Shortcut key

Reduce the size of the selected node or link Increase the size of the selected node or link
Freeze or release the selected node Change the arrow style of the selected link
Change the curve type of the selected link Change the dot/dash/solid line style of the selected link

For inquiries, please email wanglk at hsc.pku.edu.cn.

Graph detail

Graph detail contains all the information in the current graph.
This graph can be regenerated by storage of this information.

Note

This tool can be used off-line. All graphs may be stored in your own PC. For questions, please email wanglk at hsc.pku.edu.cn.
